PackageOracle.name: DA_FIELD_TECHN_BILLING_STATION
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_FIELD_TECHN_BILLING_STATION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.54.058976000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,field_technician_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,field_technician_id IN NUMBER
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_field_techn_billing_station;

body.name: DA_FIELD_TECHN_BILLING_STATION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_FIELD_TECHN_BILLING_STATION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.54.068626000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,field_technician_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_field_techn_billing_station.add, parms=' || billing_station_id || '|' || field_technician_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_field_techn_billing_station a
(
a.billing_station_id
,a.field_technician_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.billing_station_id
,add.field_technician_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_field_techn_billing_station.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,field_technician_id IN NUMBER
,billing_station_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_field_techn_billing_station.del, parms=' || field_technician_id || '|' || billing_station_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_field_techn_billing_station a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.field_technician_id = del.field_technician_id
AND a.billing_station_id = del.billing_station_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_field_techn_billing_station.del');

END del;

END da_field_techn_billing_station;
